parameters.name: PtzHt
parameters.description: Height of the projected tolerance zone

parameters.name: DisplayIn
parameters.description: True to display the projected zone tolerance, false to not

title: IGtol.SetPTZHeight
signature:
void SetPTZHeight( 
   System.String
PtzHt
,
   System.Boolean
DisplayIn
)

parameters.name: PtzHt
parameters.description: Height of the projected tolerance zone

parameters.name: DisplayIn
parameters.description: True to display the projected zone tolerance, false to not

remarks: The projected tolerance zone (PTZ) displays in the first tolerance window of the first control frame of the GTol. If PtzHt is not empty, its value is displayed after the PTZ symbol, which is a P enclosed in a circle.
